item.title: Shirin add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Anyone whose goal is 'something higher' must expect someday to suffer vertigo. What is vertigo? Fear of falling? No, Vertigo is something other than fear of falling. It is the voice of the emptiness below us which tempts and lures us, it is the desire to fall, against which, terrified, we defend ourselves." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Forgive me," he went on. "For a long time I have had the peculiar habit of not arriving but appearing." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "The longing for order is at the same time a longing for death, because life is an incessant disruption of order." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: Shirin add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "برای من بزرگترین معجزه همین است که وجود دارم." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Shirin add a quote by صادق هدایت
item.description: "اگر مرگ نبود همه ارزویش میکردند" -- صادق هدایت

item.title: Shirin add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "اگر کسی تمدن می خواهد باید وحشیگری و بی شرفی ها را فراموش کند." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Shirin add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "آنچه زندگانی را زهرآلود می کند جنگ برای زندگی نیست، بلکه کشمکش سر چیزهای پوچ و بیهوده است." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Shirin add a quote by صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat
item.description: "در همین جهان است که دست کم می توانی امیدوار باشی که روزی کلک خودت را بکنی، امیدی که در آن جهان نمی تواند وجود داشته باشد." -- صادق هدایت / Sadegh Hedayat

item.title: Shirin add a quote by صادق هدایت
item.description: "هرچه قضاوت دیگران درباره من سخت بوده باشد نمیدانند که من بیشتر خودم را سخت قضاوت کرده ام" -- صادق هدایت

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "Take me, I am the drug; take me, I am hallucinogenic" -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "The first man to compare the cheeks of a young woman to a rose was obviously a poet; the first to repeat it was possibly an idiot." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "One day it will have to be officially admitted that what we have christened reality is an even greater illusion than the world of dreams." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "What is a television apparatus to man, who has only to shut his eyes to see the most inaccessible regions of the seen and the never seen, who has only to imagine in order to pierce through walls and cause all the planetary Baghdads of his dreams to rise from the dust." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Salvador Dali
item.description: "There are some days when I think I'm going to die from an overdose of satisfaction." -- Salvador Dali

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Should I kill myself, or have a cup of coffee?" -- Albert Camus

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "Love does not consist of gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Shirin add a quote by Anna Akhmatova
item.description: "I know beginnings, I know endings too, and life-in-death, and something else I'd rather not recall just now." -- Anna Akhmatova
